lyrics:
4 contributorseverybody hates me lyricsverse 1
well joe got a promotion
hes up there on top
everybody was cheering him on
he deserves everything hes got

chorus
guess whos the new talk of the town
the new sob
the one everybody loves cutting down
man its a sight to see
they all smile right to his face and hide the jealousy
me im just working hard to get to that place
where everybody hates me

now check this out

verse 2
well bill got a promotion
he knocked joe back down
now joes everybodys long lost friend laugh
hes back in the crowd

chorus
guess whos the new talk of the town
the new sob
the one everybody loves cutting down
man its a sight to see
they all smile right to his face and hide the jealousy
me im just working hard to get to that place
where everybody hates me
see tim mcgraw liveget tickets as low as 30you might also likebridge
well everybody wants to be the big dog
want to wag that big dog tail
but till they are they want to see the big dog fail

chorus
you pay your dues and you get your breaks
then youâ€™re the sob
the one everybody loves to hate
it just comes naturally
they all smile right to your face and hide the jealousy
thats just the way it goes and i cant wait
till everybody hates meembed
